description: Header file defining the AdvancedConfig class, which implements a stub interface for Advanced Configuration operations in a testing framework. It includes method bindings for RPC calls related to advanced configuration management, such as start, get, set, add/del object, and health status functions.

classes.name: AdvancedConfig
classes.description: A class implementing RPC stub methods for advanced configuration management, inheriting from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer for JSON-RPC communication.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the test module with a specified version.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up resources for the specified version.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Checks prerequisites before running the test module.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_Start
methods.description: Stub method for starting advanced config process.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_Get
methods.description: Stub method for retrieving configuration parameters.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_GetAttr
methods.description: Stub method for getting configuration attribute.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_SetAttr
methods.description: Stub method for setting configuration attribute.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_GetNames
methods.description: Stub method for retrieving configuration names.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_Set
methods.description: Stub method for setting configuration parameters.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_Set_Get
methods.description: Stub method for setting and getting configuration parameters.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_AddObject
methods.description: Stub method for adding a configuration object.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_DelObject
methods.description: Stub method for deleting a configuration object.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_SetCommit
methods.description: Stub method for committing configuration changes.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_GetHealth
methods.description: Stub method for retrieving health status.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_SetSessionId
methods.description: Stub method for setting a session ID.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_Stop
methods.description: Stub method for stopping the configuration process.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig_SetMultiple
methods.description: Stub method for setting multiple parameters.
